name: Alpha Werewolf
des: Eat a villager each night. Only alpha werewolf can choose victim.

name: Aura Seer
des: At night, find out if someone has a non-ordinary role and what it is.

name: Witch
des: Kill or heal a player, once each per game.

name: Bodyguard
des: Choose a different player each night to protect. That player cannot be killed that night.

name: Hunter
des: If you are killed, take someone down with you.

name: Villager
des: The Villagers are a team seeking to kill all of the Werewolves. A Villager is a player character with no abilities, but the Village also includes any role not on the same team of the Werewolves, like the Guard, the Seer, the Witch, and others.
